rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area with Bohemian decor and accent lighting; includes seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, featuring a large table and open space for gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern design with open shelving, bright colors; integrated dining area on one side.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open courtyard featuring greenery and seating for outdoor relaxation.

openings.description: Main entrance with decorative elements reflecting Bohemian style.
Emergency exit leading to the courtyard and back garden.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious room with a large balcony overlooking the courtyard. Bohemian touches include wall art and natural fabrics.

rooms.name: Child's Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy room designed for comfort; includes built-in storage and a small study area.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Entertainment space with projection screen, sound system, and comfortable seating. Designed with acoustic panels and ambient lighting.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom design with functional layout.

openings.description: Sturdy staircase connecting ground to first floor with safe railings and ample lighting.
Balcony door leading to private outdoor space.
